name: Logic Game Collection PRO Free
description:
The application contain 11 different grid-based logic puzzle game types so far, three of them already has two variations.

This game's main feature is the riddles are generated randomly. It means that You will never run out of puzzles, you do not need any more level packs, theoretically you can play offline all the possible variations.

The game is still under development, although it already works (almost) perfectly.
